rule.demo: detect the package type and grab it, then place it at the target location
rule.intent: (detect the package type) and (grab it), then (place it at the target location)

rule.demo: grab the package and mail it to the target location at the same time.
rule.intent: (grab the package) and (mail it to the target location) (at the same time)

rule.demo: complete the whole cooking process
rule.intent: (complete the whole cooking process)

rule.demo: check the safety of the environment, grab the package, and then move it to the target location.
rule.intent: (check the safety of the environment), (grab the package), and then (move it to the target location)

rule.demo: interrupt the assembly if the environment is unsafe, otherwise assemble the parts and check the quality.
rule.intent: (interrupt the assembly) (if the environment is unsafe), otherwise (assemble the parts) and (check the quality)

rule.demo: retrieve the parts that meet the positioning requirements and check the quality after assembly
rule.intent: (retrieve the parts) that (meet the positioning requirements) and (check the quality) after (assembly)

rule.demo: retrieve the necessary parts and position them correctly before assembly
rule.intent: (retrieve the necessary parts) and (position them correctly) before (assembly)

rule.demo: assemble the parts securely
rule.intent: (assemble the parts securely)

rule.demo: grab the necessary parts, position them correctly, and then assemble the parts
rule.intent: (grab the necessary parts), (position them correctly), and then (assemble the parts)

rule.demo: request human assistance if necessary
rule.intent: (request human assistance) if necessary

rule.demo: check the component status, and then assemble the parts
rule.intent: (check the component status), and then (assemble the parts)

rule.demo: check the component status, and then check the assembly quality
rule.intent: (check the component status), and then (check the assembly quality)

rule.demo: request human assistance and grab the parts at the same time if necessary
rule.intent: (request human assistance) and (grab the parts) (at the same time if necessary)

rule.demo: check that all parts needed for assembly are available, then start the assembly process
rule.intent: (check that all parts needed for assembly are available), then (start the assembly process)

rule.demo: check the component status, and then grab the necessary parts
rule.intent: (check the component status), and then (grab the necessary parts)

rule.demo: grab parts and perform assembly step by step
rule.intent: (grab parts) and (perform assembly) (step by step)

rule.demo: request assistance and grab the necessary parts at the same time
rule.intent: (request assistance) and (grab the necessary parts) (at the same time)

rule.demo: position the parts correctly for assembly
rule.intent: (position the parts correctly) for assembly

rule.demo: package the assembled parts securely for shipping
rule.intent: (package the assembled parts securely) for shipping

rule.demo: interrupt operation when encountering obstacles or dangerous situations
rule.intent: (interrupt operation) when (encountering obstacles or dangerous situations)

rule.demo: grab and position the parts, then start the assembly process
rule.intent: (grab) and (position the parts), then (start the assembly process)

rule.demo: retrieve the parts that meet the positioning requirements and check the quality after assembly
rule.intent: (retrieve the parts) that (meet the positioning requirements) and (check the quality) after (assembly)

rule.demo: retrieve the necessary parts and position them correctly before assembly
rule.intent: (retrieve the necessary parts) and (position them correctly) before (assembly)

rule.demo: complete the whole cooking process
rule.intent: (complete the whole cooking process)

rule.demo: please go around this obstacle and get me your phone on the table
rule.intent: (go around this obstacle) and (get me your phone on the table)

rule.demo: get the necessary workpiece, position it correctly, and then assemble it
rule.intent: (get the necessary workpiece), (position it correctly), and then (assemble it)

rule.demo: interrupt the assembly if the environment is unsafe
rule.intent: (interrupt the assembly) (if the environment is unsafe)

rule.demo: check for obstacles while checking parts status
rule.intent: (check for obstacles) while (checking parts status)
